page.title: 06SOCIAL ACTIVITIES CONT.
page.content: The{Village Hall}in Loppington provides a centre for many different groups and meetings, for example, the Women's Institute, the Ladies' Guild, the Junior Youth Club and the Senior Youth Club, the Parochial Church Council, the Parish Council, and the Village Hall Committee. Many{fund raising}events are held throughout the year to raise money for the repair of the{Church Tower,}and the completion of the conversion work on the Village Hall which, until recently, used to be the{village {school.
